---
category: news
title: "Academic journals begin using AI to detect image duplication fraud"
excerpt: "In particular, many journals need help detecting image duplication fraud in Western blots, which are a specific style of protein-detection imagery consisting of line segments of various widths. Subtle differences in a blot's appearance can translate to dramatically different conclusions about test results,"
